verses.roman:
mahāprabhura kṛpāya kṛṣṇa-prema anargala
ei ta' kahiluṅ tāte caitanya-kṛpā-phala

synonyms: mahāprabhura kṛpāya—by the mercy of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kṛṣṇa-prema anargala—incessantly overwhelmed with ecstatic love of Kṛṣṇa; ei ta'-thus; kahiluṅ—I have described; tāte—thereby; caitanya-kṛpā-phala—the result of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu's mercy.
translation: Thus I have described the powerful mercy of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, by which Raghunātha Bhaṭṭa Gosvāmī remained constantly overwhelmed with ecstatic love for Kṛṣṇa.
